long_term_memory:
Storage:
- Local dev DB: connsura-backend/dev.db (SQLite).
- Staging DB: /opt/connsura/data/connsura.db (SQLite).
- Uploads stored on disk: /opt/connsura/uploads (server) and connsura-backend/uploads (local).
- Forms served from connsura-backend/forms.

Models:
- User with role (CUSTOMER/AGENT) and 1:1 Agent/Customer.
- Agent fields include languages, states, products, appointedCarriers, reviews (JSON strings).
- Customer fields include preferredLangs, priorInsurance, coverages, profileData (JSON strings).
- Driver and Vehicle rows belong to Customer.
- Message links Agent and Customer.
- AdminUser and AuditLog for admin operations.

Data flows:
- Customer profile updates replace drivers/vehicles.
- Agent status/approval controlled by admin/onboarding flows.

Open questions:
- Data retention and backup policy not documented.
- Production DB strategy not documented.

Next steps:
- Update memory after deploy or major data model changes.
